channel.title: street performance on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in street performance on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Last Week
item.description: Watched lots of movies, uploaded some photos to Running and walked around Paris last week. New in gallery - bibs from running . Well you must be wondering what is that ? For a person like me from whom the activity of sport was taken away by various pressures at young age it means a lot. The good side of it is that I am the very few fortunate one to run at this age at various places but rest remains as silent voice in vast population of India.
